attacks.name: Scorpion Grapple
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Cross Poison
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If 2 or more of them are heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Derail
attacks.effect: Discard all Special Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon.
